A.name: Payable elsewhere
A.desc:
Responsibility for payment of transport charges unknown at time of
                                    departure.

B.name: Third party to pay
B.desc:
A third party to pay the freight bill is known at the time of
                                    shipment.

C.name: Collect
C.desc: Charges are (to be) collected from the consignee at the destination.

P.name: Prepaid
P.desc: Charges are (to be) prepaid before the transport actually leaves.
